message: Let's make a deal. This offer is in your best interest, especially considering the inflation.
Alice, my turn. I understand the inflation is working against me, but your previous offer was heavily skewed in your favor. This offer is much fairer while still acknowledging the time pressure.
Bob, time is money, literally! Let's be reasonable. This offer still gives you a decent share, and avoids further losses from inflation.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  You're pushing me to a point where accepting almost nothing will be better than continuing this charade. I'm willing to be generous, but this is my final offer.
